scripts.xfull-build: npm --prefix scraping run server && npm --prefix app run build
scripts.xfull-start: npm --prefix scraping run server && npm --prefix app run start
scripts.full-build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm --prefix scraping run server:prod" "npm --prefix app run build"
scripts.full-start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm --prefix scraping run server:prod" "npm --prefix app run start"
